short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters items on Amazon pages by unit price -- enabling you to find the lowest price by unit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Unit Price enhances your shopping journey on Amazon by allowing you to effortlessly compare prices and make better purchasing decisions. With a focus on unit price comparison, this extension displays a detailed overview of products, helping you to find the most cost-effective options at a glance. Currently this is compatible with all Amazon TLDs!
